column4: Domain Directory or Domain Home - Root of the Weblogic Domain
Domain Name - Name of the domain hosting the config.xml
Admin User name - the user allowed to log into the Weblogic console
The name of the OCFS2 Cluster containing OS_NODE_1 and OS_NODE_2. The cluster may contain only only one  OS_NODE if it is a single VM being used
Total Number of Nodes in the OCFS2 filesystem Cluster. For only one VM change value to 1 and it will use only the value in OS_NODE_1_NAME and OS_NODE_1_INDEX
Name of the FIRST OS_NODE in the  in the  OCFS2 Filesystem Cluster
Private IP Address of the FIRST  NODE in the OCFS2 Filesystem - eth1
Index 1  showing FIRST Node  in the  OCFS2 Filesystem Cluster
OCFS Disk Name to be mounted  on NODE1
Name of the SECOND OS_NODE in the OCFS2  Filesystem Cluster
Private IP Address of the SECOND  NODE in the OCFS2 Filesystem - eth1
Index 2 showing  SECOND NODE in the  OCFS2 Filesystem Cluster
OCFS Disk Name to be mounted  on NODE2
Front End Host - Fully qualified domain name for accessing weblogic from HTTP server.
Front End HTTP Port  - Listen Port -  accessing weblogic from HTTP server.
Front End HTTPS Port  -SSL  Listen Port -  accessing weblogic from HTTP server.
Front End Host - Fully qualified domain name for accessing weblogic from HTTP server.
Front End HTTP Port  - Listen Port -  accessing weblogic from HTTP server.
Front End HTTPS Port  -SSL  Listen Port -  accessing weblogic from HTTP server.
NodeManager Listen Address for HOST Machine 1
NodeManager Listen Address for HOST Machine 2
NodeManager Listen Port  for HOST Machine 1 and Machine 2
Nodemanager Home used for enrolling the Nodemanager to the Domain
Logical Machine Host Name - for AdminServer - NOT TO BE CHANGED
Logical Machine Listen Address - for AdminServer
Logical Machine Listen Port - for AdminServer
Logical Machine Host Name - SOA1, OSB1, WSM1 Managed Servers - NOT TO BE CHANGED
Logical Machine Listen Address - SOA1, OSB1, WSM1 Managed Servers
Logical Machine Listen Port - for SOA1, OSB1, WSM1 Managed Servers
Logical Machine Host Name - SOA2, OSB2, WSM2 Managed Servers - NOT TO BE CHANGED
Logical Machine Listen Address - SOA2, OSB2, WSM2 Managed Servers
Logical Machine Listen Port - SOA2, OSB2, WSM2 Managed Servers
Logical Machine Host Name - BAM1 Managed Server - NOT TO BE CHANGED
Logical Machine Listen Address - BAM1 Managed Server
Logical Machine Listen Port - BAM1 Managed Server
Logical Machine Host Name - BAM2 Managed Server - NOT TO BE CHANGED
Logical Machine Listen Address - BAM2 Managed Server
Logical Machine Listen Port - BAM2 Managed Server
AdminServer Listen Address - Virtual IP used to access the Weblogic console
AdminServer Listen Port  - Port used to access the Weblogic console
AdminServer Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
WSM Managed Server 1 - Virtual IP Address
Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
WSM Managed Server 2 - Virtual IP Address
Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
SOA  Managed Server 1 - Virtual IP Address
Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
SOA Managed Server 2 - Virtual IP Address
Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
OSB  Managed Server 1 - Virtual IP Address
Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
OSB Managed Server 2 - Virtual IP Address
Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
BAM Managed Server 1 - Virtual IP Address
Logical Machine Host Name - NOT TO BE CHANGED
BAM Managed Server 2 - Virtual IP Address
SOA1 WKA1 SERVER NAME --- NOT TO BE CHANGED
SOA2 WKA2 SERVER NAME --- NOT TO BE CHANGED
OSB1 WKA1 SERVER NAME --- NOT TO BE CHANGED
OSB2 WKA2 SERVER NAME --- NOT TO BE CHANGED
Rac Scan address 1  - For a single VM  Host 1 and Host 2 will be same.
Rac Scan address  2 - For a single VM  Host 1 and Host 2 will be same.
RAC Database Port - For the two databases they are assumed to be the same
RAC Service Name for accessing the database instances
RAC Database 1 Name - For A single VM, Database 1 and Database 2 will be the same
RAC Database 2 Name - For A single VM, Database 1 and Database 2 will be the same
File containing Database Metadata creation steps
